bibl.title: Some Observations on Christian Burial Practices at Kellis.
assisted by Bruce E. PARR, The Oasis Papers 3. Proceedings of the Third International Conference of the Dakhleh Oasis Project
bibl.author: BOWEN, Gillian E.

bibl.note: Introduction. - Kellis 2 Cemetery. - Early Christian Burial Practices in Egypt. - Pagan Burial Practices in the Oases during the Roman Period. - The Suggested Period of Use of the Kellis 2 Cemetery. - Other Christian Burials at Kellis. - Foetal Burials. - Conclusions. - References.
BOWEN Gillian E., Some Observations on Christian Burial Practices at Kellis.

Gillian E. BOWEN and Colin A. HOPE (Edd.), assisted by Bruce E. PARR, The Oasis Papers 3. Proceedings of the Third International Conference of the Dakhleh Oasis Project = Dakhleh Oasis Project: Monograph No. 14 (Oxford, 2003) pp. 167-182.
